short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for screen capture. It can initiate screen capture when click on the button, then save it locally as png file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For this version of Chrome extension for screen capture.
Chrome extension that can initiate screen capture when click on the button.
It then capture a single frame as an image when the user selects that broswer tab.

It then stops the stream and sends a success response.This implementation will automatically download the captured image as "screen_capture.png" . Although it is so primitive like a dinosaur,  Usr can simply use it to save it locally in harddisk as an image file. 
It's free to use.
It works offline.
It doesn't require any API keys or external services.
